sentences.sContent: He struggled to overcome his shyness.
sentences.sCn: 他努力克服自己的羞怯。

sentences.sContent: Her financial problems could no longer be overcome.
sentences.sCn: 她的经济困难再也无法解决。

sentences.sContent: ...but I am thankful to be in a position where I can help people overcome this struggle...

remMethod.val: 来自词组come over(战胜， 支配)

trans.tranOther: to successfully control a feeling or problem that prevents you from achieving something
